title: Syllabus mentioned in ERP
text:
• Development of Psyche-various streams of society
• Schools of Western Psychology
• Panchakosha Theory
• Involution and Evoution- Shree Aurobindo
• Patanjali's Yoga sutras (Basics)
• 4 Purusharths and Ashrama of life along with Jaati vs Varna vs Caste
• Dharma
• 5 Hemispheres of Existence- Physical, Vital, Mental, Psychic & Spiritual
• On Education (The Mother- Shree Aurobindo Ashram)
• Various Fundamental Researchers (PPTs by students)

title: How to Crack the Paper
text: Midsem- 20% (60 marks) Endsem-30% (90 marks) Social activity- 10% PPT-10% Self Analysis Journal-10% Regular Diary Writing-10% Attendance-10%
